products.name: 16 oz. Fiberglass Handle Hammer
products.description: The 16 oz. Claw Hammer features Perm bond construction between its head and handle for strength. It has a comfort cushion Shock Reduction Grip Protect your eyes from flying particles and dust.

products.name: 16 oz. Rubber Mallet
products.description: Wood handle for durability. Black rubber head won't mar surfaces. Designed for durability, performance and value.

products.name: 22 oz. Steel Checkered Face Hammer
products.description: Single-piece steel construction with oval strike face. 22-oz. head with optimal weight distribution. Magnetic nail starter for easy nail placement.

products.name: Husky Diamond Tip Magnetic Screwdriver Set (6-Piece)
products.description: Set includes 3 slotted screwdrivers and 3 Philips screwdrivers Ergonomic dual material handle for comfort and control. Lifetime Warranty with no questions, no receipt required.

products.name: Heavy-Duty Multi-Bit Screwdriver/Nut Driver- Cushion Grip Handle
products.description: Includes 3/16 in. and 1/4 in. slotted bits. Heat-treated nut driver has comfortable cushion grip handles. Shop the Multibit Screwdrivers and Nut Drivers Collection.

products.name: 9 in. High Leverage Lineman's Pliers with Crimper
products.description: Iron Carbide Edge Cutting Edge Hardened Blades. Integrated Crimper for INS and NON INS Terminals Reaming Head Design - Up to 1 1/2".

products.name: 12 in. Tongue and Groove Pliers
products.description: Undercut tongue and groove design won't slip. PermaLock fastener eliminates nut and bolt failure. Patented reinforcing edge minimizes stress breakage.

products.name: 5 in. Fastback Flip Pocket Knife
products.description: The Milwaukee FASTBACK Flip Pocket Knife quickly opens with the press of a button and flip of the wrist for quick cutting. The smooth blade easily cuts through material leaving a clean edge. It's also easy to sharpen.

products.name: Quick Change Retractable Knife (2-Pack)
products.description: This Stanley Quick Change Retractable Knife 2-pack is ideal for the DIYer for most common cutting applications. The blade has an integrated string cutter even when blade is retracted.
